abstract: MLB suspends three minor league pitchers, one in New York Yankees system and two in Philadelphia Phillies system, for violating league's doping policy; other baseball items noted.
snippet: The Yankees right-hander Daniel Gil, who is on the Class A Tampa Yankees, was suspended 50 games for testing positive for Sibutramine, a performance-enhancing drug.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees right-hander Daniel Gil, who is on the Class A Tampa Yankees, was suspended 50 games for testing positive for Sibutramine, a performance-enhancing drug.
